tag.name: cHTML - Send Request to Hubspot API to update contacts

parameter.value:
<script>
  (function () {
    // Cloud Function URL
    var cloudFunctionUrl = '[YOUR_CLOUD_FUNCTION_URL]';
        
    // Define an object to hold GTM variable names
    var gtmVariables = {
      email: {{dlv - email}},
      first_name: {{dlv - firstName}},
      last_name: {{dlv - lastName}},
      utm_campaign: {{cjs - utm_campaign}},
      utm_source: {{cjs - utm_source}},
      utm_medium: {{cjs - utm_medium}},
      utm_content: {{cjs - utm_content}},
      utm_term: {{cjs - utm_term}},
      fbclid: {{cjs - fbclid}},
      gclid: {{cjs - gclid}}
    };

    // Initialize the data object
    var data = {};

    // Iterate over the GTM variables and add them to the data object if they have values
    for (var param in gtmVariables) {
      var paramValue = gtmVariables[param];
      if (paramValue) {
        data[param] = paramValue;
      }
    }

    // Check if the data object is empty (no valid parameters found)
    if (Object.keys(data).length === 0) {
      console.log('No valid parameters found.');
      return;
    }

    // Perform the POST request with the constructed data object
    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open('POST', cloudFunctionUrl + '/update-hubspot-crm', true);
    xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json;charset=UTF-8');

    xhr.onreadystatechange = function () {
      if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200) {
        // Request was successful, you can handle the response here.
        console.log(xhr.responseText);
      }
    };

    xhr.send(JSON.stringify(data));
  })();
</script>

customTemplate.name: Persist Campaign Data
